description: One-minute skill: Group Portraits and Dynamics.

hook.text: One person is easy. Three are tricky. Twenty are chaos. Group portraits are photography's hardest puzzle.

discovery.text: Triangular arrangements create visual stability. Staggering heights adds depth. Interaction beats rigid lines.

twist.text: The biggest challenge isn't composition â€” it's timing. Getting everyone to look good in the same instant is chaos.

climax.text: The secret: shoot many frames fast, make people laugh, and accept that perfection means everyone's eyes are open.

punchline.text: The perfect group photo: everyone's eyes open. That's the bar.

quiz.question: What is the biggest challenge in group portraits?
options: Getting everyone to look good at the same instant
